word_mean: 日射病，中暑：因曝晒于烈日下产生的一种病状，表现为抽搐、昏迷、及皮肤高温

entry.def: Sunstroke is an illness caused by spending too much time in hot sunshine.

means.word_mean: 1. sudden prostration due to exposure to the sun or excessive heat

sentences.en: Someone who is suffering from sunstroke feels dizzy and has a high temperature.
